html.code: | mcatalog values(metric_name) WHERE index=* | mcatalog values(metric_name) WHERE metric_name=”disk*” AND index=*
| mstats max(CO2) prestats=t WHERE index=raspi span=10m | timechart span=10m max(CO2) AS PPM
| msearch index=_metrics | msearch index=_metrics filter="group=dutycycle name=ingest thread=udp"
